_sText:
This is my 2nd map I have made for CSS.

You are fighting in a museum, and it has 2 floors.

CT starts outside in the slightly foggy and cloudy weather, right outside the entrance to the museum.

T starts inside in the back room.

There is 1 hostage on the map but he is just for looks =p.  In other words, he doesn't move.

There are some explosive towers around the map to blow up and have fun with as well.

Alright, have fun =)
